text: Zai [zhexie] zhishi [er sa shi an la de puren he shizhe] jianglin ni [mu sheng] zhihou, shei yu ni zhenglun ta [er sa], name, ni shuo:“Nimen lai ba! Rang women zhaoji women de ernu he nimen de ernu, women de funu he nimen de funu, women ziji he nimen ziji, ranhou, rang women [qiancheng] qiqiu an la, rang women kenqiu ta [an la] qianze shuohuang zhe.”
